title: WEEKLY APT FOR RENT, WITH UTILITIES AND CABLE INCLUDED
map_address: 3655 W. Tropicana Ave near Valley View
posting_body: ['Welcome to Budget Suites where you can make one of our apartments your home for a week or beyond!', 'Budget Suites invites you to relax and unwind in your own personal apartment whether you are a family relocating to a new city, a business traveler, vacationer, or just making a new start here in Las Vegas.', 'We Offer :', 'Fully Furnished Apartments (just bring your own linens, toiletries, eating/cooking utensils)', 'All Utilities Paid', 'Free Cable TV, including SHOWTIME and ESPN', 'High Speed Internet', 'Free Local Calls', 'Full Size Kitchens', 'Full Size Appliances', 'On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Office is Open 7 Days a Week', 'Covered Parking Available', 'Beautiful Pool Spas', 'Onsite Maintenance', 'Onsite Property Management', 'Abundant Parking', 'Courtesy Patrol for your added safety', '1 bedrooms are starting at only $339/week +tax', '2 bedrooms are starting at only 429/week +tax', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
